title: Eruption!
atmosphere: Chaos and urgency. The ground shakes, smoke billows, and the radio fills with emergency broadcasts. Everything changes in an instant.
description: The volcano erupts while the Travellers are conducting their survey. What was a routine job becomes a crisis that will test everything they have.

triggers.entry: Survey work in progress, eruption begins
triggers.exit: Travellers commit to a course of action

eruption_sequence.escalation: Major eruption, ash cloud, lava flows begin

radio_traffic: Emergency broadcast from Salbarii town - evacuation underway
Mayor of Salbarii requesting any available transport
Dictator Masterton coordinating response from capital
Multiple distress calls from outlying areas

key_decisions.ship_priority: Get the Highndry airborne before it's trapped?
key_decisions.authority: Follow Masterton's commands or act independently?

narrator_prompt: The mountain remembers what it is. One moment you're taking readings, the next the ground heaves and a column of fire erupts into the sky. Ash begins to fall like grey snow. The radio crackles with voices - some commanding, some pleading. This is no longer about a survey. This is about survival. And maybe, if you're brave enough, about heroism.
